actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1038.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6515) to authorize appropriations for the fiscal year beginning October 1, 1980, for the maintenance and operation of the Panama Canal, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6515 (authorizes appropriations for the maintenance and operation of the Panama Canal, fiscal year 1981).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6515) to authorize appropriations for the fiscal year beginning October 1, 1980, for the maintenance and operation of the Panama Canal, and for other purposes.
